en.explanation_content: Move the coordinates using a matrix
en.reference_about: Type T is the type of coordinates
en.constructor_normal_explanation: Generating a matrix of three rows and three columns relating affine transformation
en.gen_scaling_explanation: Generate a matrix that moves $x$ times in the x-axis direction and $y$ times in the y-axis direction
en.gen_translation_explanation: Generate a matrix that translates $x$ in the x-axis direction and $y$ in the y-axis direction
en.gen_rotate_explanation: Generate a matrix that rotates $\theta$ degrees
en.gen_rot90_explanation: Generates a matrix that rotates 90 degrees counterclockwise $t$ times
en.gen_xskew_explanation: Generate a $\theta$ degree skewed matrix from the x-axis
en.gen_yskew_explanation: Generate a $\theta $ degree skewed matrix from the y-axis
